description: ORDER 23-02474363 Entries Confirmation Requesting service for tech. at datasets security in Ali
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
B.10 Help Desk Specialist Levels 1 and 2 (1 resource per level)

#### Notice Type
[Request for Proposal](#request-for-proposal)

#### Reference and Solicitation Numbers
*   PW-23-01028062 (Reference)
*   22-58140 (Solicitation)

#### Notice Dates
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-03-02
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-16T14:00:00 (Expired)
*   **Amendment Date**: 2023-03-03

#### Solicitation Details
*   **Procurement Category**: SRV
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
*   **Trade Agreements**: Subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contractor Information
*   **Contracting Entity Name**: National Research Council Canada
*   **Contact Information**: 
    *   **Name**: Philippe Cléroux
    *   **Email**: [philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
    *   **Address**: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R6, CA

#### Required Documents
Available for download from the Canada Buys website:

*   [Attachments 1 (.pdf)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/03/6164c8d56df7e9b921b8e109acb1595d/22-58140_-_npp_-_final.pdf)
*   [Attachments 2 (.pdf)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/02/301d20bec3e5cd40ccd36f50cff42e47/22-581
